sinks.name: Sink1
sinks.script:
sink(input(
		state as string,
		product as string,
		count as string,
		total as string,
		minprice as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Sink1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared transaction = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adlsgen2slun.dfs.core.windows.net/refineddata/Wrangling/Sales/transactions/lab_2010_transactions.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared Customer = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adlsgen2slun.dfs.core.windows.net/refineddata/Wrangling/Sales/lab_customers.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared zip_codes = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://adlsgen2slun.dfs.core.windows.net/refineddata/Wrangling/Sales/zip_to_state_map.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = "	", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv])
in
  Csv;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = transaction,
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(Source, {{"ticket_price", type number}, {"transaction_date", type date}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Changed column type", each [ticket_price] >= 1),
  #"Replaced value" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Filtered rows", "basic", "silver", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"product"}),
  #"Replaced value 1" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Replaced value", "deluxe", "gold", Replacer.ReplaceText, {"product"}),
  #"Inserted conditional column" = Table.AddColumn(#"Replaced value 1", "disc", each if [discount] = "5%" then 0.95 else if [discount] = "10%" then 0.9 else if [discount] = "20%" then 0.8 else 1),
  #"Merged queries" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Inserted conditional column", {"customer_id"}, Customer, {"customer_id"}, "Customer", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Expanded Customer" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries", "Customer", {"address_state", "address_zip", "start_date", "end_date"}, {"address_state", "address_zip", "start_date", "end_date"}),
  #"Replaced value 2" = Table.ReplaceValue(#"Expanded Customer", "", "2050/01/01", Replacer.ReplaceValue, {"end_date"}),
  #"Changed column type 1" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Replaced value 2", {{"end_date", type date}, {"start_date", type date}, {"disc", type number}}),
  #"Merged queries 1" = Table.NestedJoin(#"Changed column type 1", {"address_zip"}, zip_codes, {"Column1"}, "zip_codes", JoinKind.LeftOuter),
  #"Expanded zip_codes" = Table.ExpandTableColumn(#"Merged queries 1", "zip_codes", {"Column2"}, {"state"}),
  #"Inserted conditional column 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Expanded zip_codes", "Custom", each if [transaction_date] >= [start_date] and [transaction_date] <= [end_date] then 1 else 0),
  #"Filtered rows 1" = Table.SelectRows(#"Inserted conditional column 1", each [Custom] = 1),
  #"Adjust price" = Table.AddColumn(#"Filtered rows 1", "Adjusted_price", each [ticket_price] * [disc]),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Adjust price", {"state", "product"}, {{"Count", each Table.RowCount(_), type number}, {"Total", each List.Sum([Adjusted_price]), type any}, {"MinPrice", each List.Min([Adjusted_price]), type any}})
in
  #"Filtered rows 1";
